message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal, considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 doesn't quite cover my costs. How about we split the difference? I'm willing to come down to $10,750. This still represents a great value for you, and it allows me to make a fair profit.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10,750 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,500. Can we discuss this further?
